channel.title: Ld on BUF1024
channel.description: Recent content in Ld on BUF1024

item.title: ld常用特别选项
item.description: 链接器ld的一些特别选项，编译OS时有用到。 -N --omagic Set the text and data sections to be readable and writable. Also, do not page-align the data segment, and disable linking against shared libraries. If the output fORMat supports Unix style magic numbers, mark the output as "OMAGIC". Note: Although a writable text section is allowed
